name: Infested hole
description:
You fell into an infested hole , unfortunately you are doomed to die , give your character a chance to survive by making the best height climbed score !

1 - Save yourself !

The monstreous plants of the Infested Hole want to eat you , save yourself before you get eaten !

2 - Obstacles will not stop you !

By climbing this hole , you will find various type of obstacles , but don't worry , those obstacles will not stop you !

3 - I need a help !

Some powerups will spawn in your way , there is two types of powerups :

- Slow powerup - divide the monster speed by 2 - duration : 10s

-  powerup - divide the monster speed by 2 - duration : 10s

But don't get caught or trapped when you take those powerups , you need to be quick ! 

Changelog for the v1.2.2 :

- ScoreBoard

- Review of the controls , and some modifications on
